participant_1.background:
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
I spent more time climbing since I quit my job.
My dream is to open a restaurant and share my love of food with others.
i listen to katie perry while in the shower.
i have 10 alpacas.

participant_2.background:
I like to go to concerts and other events where I can show off my leather outfits.
I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
i vacation in florida every winter.
i am a gourmet cook.
I decided to write my own songs to challenge myself and to pursue my passion for music.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
Good so far, just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
That's nice of you. What kind of outfit?
She wanted something in leather, so I helped her pick out a cute skirt and top.
That sounds cool. I like to wear leather too.
Me too! I have a whole closet full of leather jackets, pants, and skirts.
Wow, that's a lot of leather! I only have a few pieces.
I love leather. It's so comfortable and stylish.
I agree. It's also really durable.
Definitely! I have some pieces that are over 10 years old and they still look great.
I'm impressed! I've never had anything last that long.
You just have to take good care of it.
Good. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to ride my bicycle, climb, and write.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go to concerts and other events where I can show off my leather outfits.
That sounds like a lot of fun too! I've never been to a concert in leather before.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
